title: Stabilizing soft sites
brief_description: Demonstrates how wet clay building sites can be cheaply and effectively stabilised by the addition of hydrated lime before building operations begin. This reduces expensive hold-ups due to bogged vehicles and the generally unpleasant conditions which prevail on a clay building site in winter.
